member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.CacheItemPriority
member.summary: Specifies how items are prioritized for preservation during a memory pressure triggered cleanup.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.CacheItemPriority.High
member.summary: The cache entry should be removed only when there are no other low or normal priority cache entries during memory pressure triggered cleanup.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.CacheItemPriority.Low
member.summary: The cache entry should be removed as soon as possible during memory pressure triggered cleanup.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.CacheItemPriority.NeverRemove
member.summary: The cache entry should never be removed during memory pressure triggered cleanup.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.CacheItemPriority.Normal
member.summary: The cache entry should be removed if there are no other low priority cache entries during memory pressure triggered cleanup.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.EvictionReason
member.summary: Specifies the reasons why an entry was evicted from the cache.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.EvictionReason.Capacity
member.summary: Overflow.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.EvictionReason.Expired
member.summary: Timed out.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.EvictionReason.None
member.summary: The item was not removed from the cache.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.EvictionReason.Removed
member.summary: Manually.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.EvictionReason.Replaced
member.summary: Overwritten.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.EvictionReason.TokenExpired
member.summary: Event.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.ICacheEntry.Priority
member.summary: Gets or sets the priority for keeping the cache entry in the cache during a cleanup. The default is .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.ICacheEntry.Size
member.summary: Gets or set the size of the cache entry value.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.ICacheEntry.SlidingExpiration
member.summary: Gets or sets how long a cache entry can be inactive (e.g. not accessed) before it will be removed. This will not extend the entry lifetime beyond the absolute expiration (if set).
